lead_paragraph: Aggressive opening batsman Chris Gayle usually hogs the headlines but West Indies' advance to the World Twenty20 final against England has shown they are by no means a one-man band, according to batsman Lendl Simmons.

headline.print_headline: We're Not Just Drummers in the Windies Band, Says Simmons
headline.main: We're Not Just Drummers in the Windies Band, Says Simmons

snippet: Aggressive opening batsman Chris Gayle usually hogs the headlines but West Indies' advance to the World Twenty20 final against England has shown they are by no means a one-man band, according to batsman Lendl Simmons....
